synopsis: An old recluse, neglected by his 20-something party-girl caretaker, experiments with recording in his decrepit rural mansion, which is suffused with sinister sounds that are slowly encroaching upon him. A stylish and strange horror/crime hybrid steeped in Eastern Bloc cool.
title: Inherent Noise
description: A naive young man falls for his beautiful—and very dangerous—landlord in this depraved voyeuristic thriller.
